commits.msg:
puppet-vitrage: Initial commit

This is the initial commit for puppet-vitrage.
It has been automatically generated using cookiecutter[1] and msync[2]

[1] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-openstack-cookiecutter
[2] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-modulesync-configs

Change-Id: Ieb46f034ed35fb5e3c187f78f730139b469d9cf4

Make Keystone_endpoint match service by name/type

Since a chance in puppet-keystone (1], we now match an endpoint with a
service name/type.
[1] http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/puppet-keystone/commit/?id=0a4e06abb0f5b3f324464ff5219d2885816311ce

Change-Id: I64088fb3fa7615eef41e566d67bed79dd8b1463c
Closes-Bug: #1528308

Support of PyMySQL driver for MySQL backend

This change adds the ability to use the python-pymysql library as the
backend for MySQL connections.

Change-Id: I7b4390e0e4fe1f004e2c28df76fdbb9300114647

Update typo

Change-Id: I2ad0f969df5147e5c1c30a128c50222cb6670356

add api_paste_ini configuration

Change-Id: Id2e9eb23fb8cf3cd21b85c3fb3e1f60e034860cc

Switch to oslo log

* configured using puppet oslo module instead of manual configuration
* update the metadata.json with the dependency
* remove verbose from logging
  This option is deprecated in Mitaka and has been removed in Newton
  ref: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/314573/

Change-Id: Iea4e4470abd58b09b6a136c3757624ba0d941a90

change vitrage endpoint description and type

* change the type and description
* remove version from url

Change-Id: I853235fb551628f0b82a39c29e46027f8f4ede1f

add api module and vitrage wsgi module

* update the params module with new parameters
* use wsgi if api is in httpd mode

Change-Id: I1e3445327beb7447fdc400e9ed2abf3a76eff9da

Add vitrage auth and client class

* auth.pp for vitrage authentication
* client.pp for vitrage client installation

Change-Id: I7bb2a372908614871eaca8c1aed82aaf002e4b90

Add vitrage graph class

Change-Id: Ibc53be11ab7e0e0604e8b4cd3c140c17fb1d6ca7

Switch vitrage to oslo

The db and policy options are configured using puppet oslo module.

Change-Id: I828d107f07c4fccefbf126e7b14deb4463f87ddb

Fix parameters comments

Fix comments format.
Add default values.

Change-Id: I000c184b573a9b6f487d8fd4f06e656131ac4af4

Add vitrage notifier class

Change-Id: Ic27d39b0caa94aef889e39f425924bda426d64fe

update init.pp and add example file

Change-Id: Ia360afc448c61ece0f2a498705a41d7f13af08cd

update example file with endpoint creation

Change-Id: I83457065ccdd9d6e336a2feec36b784178222e9e

Move Vitrage to authtoken

-Remove authtoken parameters from api.pp and tests
-Add authtoken class with all parameters to configure
keystone_authtoken section in configuration file.

Change-Id: I4d72037b3c8f8b86ba93e00822d9133cf5391275
Related-Bug: #1604463

Fix authtoken and metadata

-Fix identation in authtoken class doc
-Fix metadata to require puppet-keystone

Change-Id: Icb708bac2770e8ef83fe842b7e22948510b9124c

Fix puppet-lint before upgrading gem

Removing 140 chars limit exeeded in favor
of upgrading puppet-lint

2016-09-14 08:00:15.128339 | manifests/api.pp:87:WARNING: line has more than 140 characters

Change-Id: I1e7c0c9743adcd880bd756c43e6c95bdde7b1ba5

Remove unnecesary spaces in log messages.

Spaces added by mistake in some log messages.

Change-Id: Ifa05d0643ab3e66e11e94aff5955e53c64e7a736

Added retries for db_sync

If db sync fails, it is never retried leading to errors. So, this
patch adds retries for db_sync to avoid sync fails.

Change-Id: Ic6094bb265879bd6ad14beeb3a966a79d4d3b3ea
Closes-Bug: #1628580

Change worker defaults to ::os_workers

This patch changes the default worker count from ::processorcount to the
new ::os_workers fact. ::os_workers is based on the number of processors
(currently cpu/4) but is capped at a maximum of 8 worker processors.
This is a much more reasonable default in general and prevents excessive
resource consumption on systems with a large number of CPUs.

Change-Id: I00f93bc5030a794d16fae8dadef7f0396332d80f

Add support for db_max_retries param

The db_max_retries parameter regulates the number of reconnection
attempts performed after an error raised rather than at startup.

Change-Id: Ibe03fcbf2cec154ae51753fb916705b8b5dcad4d
Closes-Bug: 1579718

Add enable_proxy_headers_parsing option

The patch enables paste middleware to handle SSL requests through
HTTPProxyToWSGI middleware.

Change-Id: Iff08aa323fa63978ec8666610f197fa6038a2c28

include ::openstacklib::defaults in params.pp

The ::openstacklib::defaults is default configuration for all
openstack-puppet module. This file is loaded in the params.pp
of each class

Change-Id: I43dcb204c1d1ba777ad05fe04378d15eaa0a0203

Deprecate rabbitmq connection parameters

The rabbitmq connection parameters have been deprecated in favor of the
transport_url setting.

Change-Id: I30258476791a5e1a000d232455cb4d1b843b85ff
Related-Bug: #1625198

Add hooks for external install & svc management

This adds defined anchor points for external modules to hook into the
software install, config and service dependency chain.  This allows
external modules to manage software installation (virtualenv,
containers, etc) and service management (pacemaker) without needing rely
on resources that may change or be renamed.

Change-Id: I9265926488573daeba3acfcd8659caef3e37b9e2

Remove signing_dir option

The signing_dir is deprecated for removel because PKI token format
is no longer supported.

Change-Id: I8eca92237301a26a014b95b138211cb655d88f7e
Closes-Bug: #1652700

Allow python-memcache install from authtoken class

The python-memcache package is required if using memcached. By
default the package is not installed and the define has it set to
false. This change allows managing the python-memcache package
install from the authtoken class.

Change-Id: Ia27c33e963f35140e161737ae06afc241df0b117

Add oslo::db to dependency chain

All db settings should be applied and all releated packages should be
installed before dbsync starts.

Change-Id: I8f3fa5dd43c36f6253509327ddbf9563204b773c

Add control_exchange and rpc_response_timeout options

Add control_exchange to configure an exchange name for message.
Add rpc_response_timeout to configure seconds time for waiting
for a response from a call.

Change-Id: I40e284d72ac10c7d0b22b57d33401d1211b9232e

Update auth parameters to support Keystone v3

Update service_credentials to support Keystone v3 by default.

* Add project_domain_name and user_domain_name, default to default
domain.
* Add auth_type default to password.
* Update tenant_name to project_name, in a transparent way.



Change-Id: I4743bfe1fa0e6ab1763985239b2de273e4aeb4c0

Inconsistent package_ensure parameter name

The parameter name used to enforce package state is inconsistent across
manifests and modules. I settle on package_ensure since it's already
widely used.

Change-Id: I52a903ad06efff389a731c845b8c8a1958bfdad5
Closes-Bug: #1668732

keep backward compatibility in logging

currently puppet-openstack-integration for vitrage is in debug true
but it doesnt work this change will fix it

Change-Id: I60df55889d3da68f89e6cb5983663f61fc2edc47

add new paramters to vitrage class

add the ability to use diffrent parameters then default
for viterage

datasources type and snapshots_interval

Change-Id: I554e1a34fba135b52d7b92ba23702c3dadd2f1da

Add the setting log level

Increase the setting log level in the synchronization database.

Change-Id: Ia38512b1c97ecbca556605e760584376d8725dd9
Closes-Bug: #1683567

Add class to manage vitrage-collector service

New service vitrage-collector has been added to vitrage
in https://review.openstack.org/#/c/474560.

This patch adds support for this new service.

Change-Id: I1d18f6c0d38bb66e03ab2977570310cb2357015c

Add customization for wsgi process displayname

Change-Id: I9877cce106597709da53c8c2f552344daaf9c41b
Related-Bug: #1626550

Fix filename of api-paste.ini

Change-Id: I7507c81948b14705c79cf0b11ae362ce79b5504e
Closes-Bug: #1706473

Remove rpc_backend conditional for oslo.messaging driver options

Oslo.messaging uses the transport_url to represent the rpc and
notification messaging driver to use and its full configuration. The
rpc_backend configuration option is deprecated for removal and
should not gate oslo.messaging driver configuration options.

This patch:
* deprecate rpc_backend
* remove conditional check
* update spec tests
* add release note

Change-Id: I2700421a187d8f815ba42a4160c46659876f854e

Fix rpc_backend option warning and test failed

1) The value of rpc_backend option is 'rabbit', not $::os_service_default.
so fix the if statement condition.
2) Fix unit test.

Closes-Bug: #1708976

Change-Id: Ie407c576f8f45856f63bd843f3c7b88876683f5a

Deprecate revocation_cache_time option

The revocation_cache_time is deprecated for removel because of PKI
token format is no longer supported.
Update warning message.

Change-Id: I630565efc7803efe3c96cf476f389e90bcd42f6e
Closes-Bug: #1717144

Accept empty strings for log_dir

An empty string is an acceptable value of this entry, and it forces
logging to stdout/stderr, which is useful when running on containers.

Change-Id: Idabeecc10657d96102d496e8204ef92a420a62b7

Allow setting log files for apache vhost

This allows the setting of the error and access file logs, as well as
the access log format. This was done in a similar fashion as one can
configure these ones in the keystone wsgi manifest.

Change-Id: Ie2a4c15d48b678371516cd2e20b019737b8ee742

Revert "Allow setting log files for apache vhost"

We did not cut a stable/pike release for this module.  This patch
will remove a functionality which is incompatible with the
stable/pike branch and it will be restored in master.

This reverts commit 3a15286a8a0760e912e53283a872984bb225282d.

Change-Id: I76b6e36e230db4951cff218ee8581401d7078466

Revert "Revert "Allow setting log files for apache vhost""

This reverts commit e8fc275e3cf729f6c890eefc96faa6a6d0b06cf2.

Change-Id: I556f740f0fbc9372598afe551681cfcbc76800a5

Switch to use keystone v3

Keystone v2 api's are removed in [1], so it's required
to use keystone v3 otherwise all requests fallbacks to
keystone v2.0 and fails.

[1] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/499783/

Change-Id: I0464d6b37c3e269d3bdc1eb5034ec751f977b6a8
Closes-Bug: #1723838

Configure *_domain_name to Default by default

Keystone v2.0 API was removed so we have no choice but configuring
user_domain_name and project_domain_name otherwise it fallbacks to
Keystone v2.0 and it fails. This patch sets the default value so we make
sure Keystone v3 will be used out of the box for our users.

Change-Id: I722d3d730a57a2106b1e9db99020c475bdd15fb5

add parameter to overwrite/add wsgi process options

Add parameter to apache_wsgi to allow overwrite
and/or add additional wsgi process options.

This possibility was added to openstacklib
with Change-Id: I41914ce3361988d5db1695f09d21209772fdf548
lease enter the commit message for your changes. Lines starting

Change-Id: I477745910b2f03e75d5faa280825c5ca45daae27

Expose use_json logging option

It enables JSON-formatted logging from oslo.log.

Change-Id: I2416a66dbb8719192d6e342ee9c58d639a86db41

Update db-sync command

Change-Id: Id3d72c6f34e697a1c90d52b192ca81d0ec4f0552

Introduce vitrage::persistor

Change-Id: I34b7c0d151bd94f5aac31dd166246accbbcb69c0

Allow to configure notifiers

Change-Id: I2fadae52aa59e3ee0fe74ddd3973a3e0863adca1

Add group to policy management

The move of policy.json into code means the file may not exist. We've
added support to ensure that the file exists in the openstacklib but we
need to make sure the permissions are right for each service. This adds
the group information to the policies so it works right.

Depends-On: I26e8b1384f4f69712da9d06a4c565dfd1f17c9ed
Change-Id: I10db340eeb00824864d0048ebb8a2df1acff98ef
Co-Authored-By: Alex Schultz <aschultz@redhat.com>

Add use_journal option for logging configuration

This enables oslo.log to pass logging records to journald.

Change-Id: I51411d8fcea59d828f2d1c6c179d78c9ab516a0e

Rename persistor config opt

vitrage has renamed 'persistor/persist_events' config
option in [1], similar change is required in puppet-vitrage.

[1] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/530650

Change-Id: I140dddd7baae00b11cbb50f3cf2d1a3b6b7e162b

Add kombu_failover_strategy option

Adds the kombu_failover_strategy option for configuring
oslo.messaging.rabbit. This will determines how the next RabbitMQ node
is chosen in case the one we are currently connected to becomes
unavailable.

Change-Id: I4556053733b57d806294119d3ec2361428011565
Closes-Bug: #1748353

Fix mysql connection

URL mysql://scott:***@some_host/some_db does not contain a '+drivername'
portion, and will make use of a default driver. A full dbname+drivername://
protocol is recommended. For MySQL, it is strongly recommended that
mysql+pymysql:// be specified for maximum service compatibility.

Change-Id: I8646f135ca2fa28c1858a900bac21acdadb08401
Closes-Bug: #1753342

Add 'openstack-db' tag to db-sync Exec resource

In order to make easy orchestration on all OpenStack db-sync, add this
tag so people can use this tag in composition layer.
A use case it to set some orchestration to make sure MySQL Galera is
ready before running any Exec with this tag.

Change-Id: I86811c7e3c38106eb9ed45180970344e060ed7e7
Closes-Bug: #1755102

Add pool_timeout option

Add pool_timeout option to configure this value for pool_timeout with
SQLAlchemy.

Change-Id: Ie8b3d5bbdfaea4a557b52eb33a0830a8bde0e9c8
Closes-Bug: #1757581

Deprecate auth_uri option

Option auth_uri from group keystone_authtoken is deprecated[1].
Use option www_authenticate_uri from group keystone_authtoken.

[1]https://review.openstack.org/#/c/508522/

Change-Id: I4494127d11456a237af33cc969bde2dae081ce9c
Depends-On: I4c82a63baabd6b9304b302c97cd751a0103d8316
Depends-On: I1bb3489acf1f591eefbad91bdbb666b21a53238a
Closes-Bug: #1759098

Debian is using python3-vitrageclient

Change-Id: If75b85bd2daa17abcf7036b50e5a8008c4195d93
Depends-On: I1bb3489acf1f591eefbad91bdbb666b21a53238a

Remove deprecated rpc_backend param

Remove the deprecated rpc_backend param which has been deprecated for
two years. The default_transport_url has been present for a while
now and should be used.

Change-Id: I98aaa75dfdc49f5cf55a7dfe4d4cc686e4cc1155

Replace port 35357 with 5000 for "auth_url"

Based on the change in Keystone Install Guide [1],
this patch replace port 35357 with 5000 for "auth_url".

For more details, please check similar changes which have been done
on other projects: Nova [2], Neutron [3], Cinder [4], Glance [5].

[1] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/541857
[2] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/562812
[3] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/566491
[4] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/565464
[5] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/558932

Change-Id: I13ed19989321e80771a62ed43cfaaf37a35425bd

Fix annotations

Change-Id: I6f3abdb0de2e2b70f5b01a1257c53cc5e180e99c

Replace port 35357 with 5000

Change-Id: I5d5881bcb372206a07c847cb892f0447ceb834c6

Fix the smoke testing link

Change-Id: I68e4171857a581fe1b82a7c698e239b02285756f
